title: Setting up an Equation
text: The first step is to set up an equation for the function, $$y=2-x$$

title: Solving the Equation in Terms of y
text: The next step is to solve the equation in terms of x. $$y=2-x$$, therefore $$x=2-y$$.

title: Interpreting the Inverse Based on the Equation
text: After replacing y with x on the right side of the equation, we can see that $$f^{\left(-1\right)} x=2-x$$.
